summary: Internal FBI email chain discussing the transfer of Ghislaine Maxwell to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn and inquiries about new victims, bail hearing dates, and case updates.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; discussed as being transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn and having an upcoming bail hearing.

persons.name: SSA CARD Coordinator
persons.context: The sender of the final email in the chain, identified as the SSA CARD Coordinator for the VCSI Crimes Against Children Human Trafficking Unit (CACHTU).

events.title: Maxwell transferred to MDC Brooklyn
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in Brooklyn.

events.title: Scheduled bail hearing for Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is expected to have a bail hearing, potentially on this Friday, but it could be moved to the following week.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn on July 6, 2020.
A bail hearing for Maxwell was anticipated for July 10, 2020, but could be postponed to the following week.
The FBI's Crimes Against Children Human Trafficking Unit (CACHTU) was actively inquiring about updates on the Maxwell case and whether any new victims had come forward.
The communication is an internal FBI email chain discussing operational details of Maxwell's detention and legal proceedings.
